title: Medical Conference Screenings
subtitle: Professional screenings designed for healthcare providers and medical professionals

hero.title: Medical Conference Screenings
hero.description: Bring the powerful story of "24 Days Without You" to your medical conference. Our professional screening package includes expert-led discussions, CME credits, and comprehensive educational materials designed specifically for healthcare professionals.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: We discuss your conference goals, audience size, and specific educational objectives to customize the screening experience.

steps.title: Logistics Planning
steps.description: Our team handles all technical requirements, speaker coordination, and educational material preparation for your event.

steps.title: Professional Screening
steps.description: Expert-facilitated screening with guided discussion, Q&A session, and actionable takeaways for your medical professionals.

highlight.title: AIM Conference Highlight
highlight.description: 24 Days Without You was shown in a plenary session at the Alliance for Innovation on Maternal Health's national conference in February 2025. It was followed by a panel discussion with Annie's OBGYN, Annie's father, and Annie. AIM also enabled their audience members to submit questions directly to Annie. She answered those questions and spoke at the close of the conference.
